## Features

### API

The {{project_name}} API provides functionality for:

- Basic calculations (addition, subtraction)
- Batch operations on collections of numbers
- Memory-based calculator functionality

[Learn more about the API](./api/index.md)

### Command Line Interface

{{project_name}} comes with a full-featured command-line interface that provides:

- Interactive calculator shell
- Batch processing capabilities
- Memory management

[Learn more about the CLI](./cli/index.md)
